subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea, the Premier League leader, scored late to beat visiting Everton, 1-0, and maintain its 7-point advantage over Manchester City, which won by 4-1 at Stoke.
snippet: Chelsea, the Premier League leader, scored late to beat visiting Everton, 1-0, and maintain its 7-point advantage over Manchester City, which won by 4-1 at Stoke.
